Open Measures is a website that archives and tracks nontraditional social media sites ranging from 4chan to Bluesky. Presumably, they sell this data to interested parties that want to monitor or more likely shape the discourse in niche communities. 

This is their analysis of Pwin.
https://openmeasures.io/open-measures-datasets-what-is-scored

Interesting to see the long term decline in the website.
